short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extention to scrape and analyze products on daraz

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DarazScout is a product research tool for product hunters on Daraz . When on a listing page, DarazScout can be used to scrape data from the page which can be exported to excel sheet for further use.

New updates:
- Login fixed
- Stock Improved
- UI improved
- Listing Page Summary
- Product Age
- Last 7 days reviews
- Last 30 days reviews

Upcoming Features:
- Product Tracking
- FBD and FBS field
- All listing summary
